name: feedback
description: Store and retrieve page ratings and comments.

scripts.setup: claudia create --profile claudia --version dev --region us-east-1 --api-module index --policies policies --configure-table-dev --configure-table-prod --runtime 'nodejs22.x'
scripts.deploy:prod: claudia update --profile claudia --runtime 'nodejs22.x' --no-optional-dependencies --version dev && claudia --profile claudia set-version --version prod
